title: section 1(2) of the Research and Innovation Act 2024 (No. 15 of 2024), hereby
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Research and Innovation Act 2024
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Research and Innovation Act 2024 

(Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited research innovation act 2024 (commencement) order 2024

title: section 1(2) of the Research and Innovation Act 2024 (No. 15 of 2024), hereby
heading: 2. The 1st day of August 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of August 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
Research and Innovation Act 2024 (No. 15 of 2024) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 July, 2024. 

PATRICK O’DONOVAN, 

Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 26th July, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [373] 3
